timeline.bodyText: Should this instead be in the correct package within src/test?
timeline.author: kstich

timeline.message:
Rename unsignedPayload and ec2QueryName

Now that the aws.api#protocols and aws.api#auth namespaces exist, these
traits make more sense to be defined in those namespaces.

Rename unsignedPayload and ec2QueryName

Now that the aws.api#protocols and aws.api#auth namespaces exist, these
traits make more sense to be defined in those namespaces.
